page.shortlink: api client api date fromformat method

argument.name: format
argument.description: The format the date is in. If no format is specified the default format in A5.d.date.format will be used

page.description: Extension to the native date variable to set the date variable to the value of the passed in date string.

discussion.p: This method parses a formatted date string to set the value in the date object. An optional format can be specified that defines the structure of the formatted date string.
See *[link:Date.toFormat]* for a full list of format values.
